name: Mire Fiend
description: The Mire Fiend is a Medium fiend with a combination of sharp mandibles, a spear, and a stinger. Its body is adapted for both land and water with a sleek form.
memorable: It possesses strong resilience to various damage types and can unleash a stunning sonic attack.
goals: Engage in combat using its pack tactics and overwhelming foes with its ability to strike quickly and stealthily.
relations: May work alongside other demons or fiends in ambush tactics.
environment: Typically found in swampy and aquatic habitats.
strengths: Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage; immune to poison; has a high stealth score in swamps.
weaknesses: Dependent on allies for higher attack success; less effective in non-swampy terrains.
attacks: Engages opponents with slashing damage from mandibles, piercing damage from a spear, and a dangerous stinger delivering poison.
most_powerful_ability: Unleashes a stunning sonic attack in a wide cone, causing significant thunder damage and potentially stunning foes.
senses: Possesses keen senses up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect hidden creatures effectively.
skills: Has a noted stealth skill with a score of 21 in swampy terrains, making it hard to detect.
additional_information: Can function both in air and water due to amphibious trait.
Magic resistance provides advantage on spell saves.
Uses acid retribution as a reactive ability when damaged.
test_queries: swamp demon with resilience and agility
stealthy aquatic creature with poison stinger
medium demon that excels in swampy terrain
creature with multiple attack options in combat
